item.description:
Note...there are more seats availabe via the New England Portrait Photographers meetup group.


Adobe Lightroom is an amazing tool. As a pro it has cut my post production in half. In the workshop we will be covering.

How to
import and catalog your image files
use the library for fast and effective editing
Use the develop tab to create the image you are looking for
Create your own styled preset to apply to mass amounts of images
Create a custom sideshow to send and share with clients
Print what you see in lightroom
Get your image galleries to the web

We will also be discussing the new features in Lightroom 2.0 Get Adobe 2.0 Beta trial

For more info on lightroom go to Adobe.com

UPDATE lightroom has made some changes please update your current edition to 1.4.1 (in lightroom go to HELP >>> Update)

If you do not have lightroom you can go to adobe and get a 30 day trial
item.name: Adobe Lightroom Workshop
